column4: hey guys right now something wierd happened, was watching a vid using VLC and when i closed it the sound was still playing
check the command, 'top'. if the process is still there, kill it.
i already tried that and i don't see the process
btw, what did that command do that you gave me?
list all processes, then search (grep) for a line with the term "vlc" in.
i used the -i flag to make it case insensitive
